軖字的基本解释

軖
kuáng
纺车。
独轮车。

軖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuáng］
［《廣韻》巨王切，平陽，羣。］
亦作“軭1”。
缫轮。亦指手摇的缫丝车。

軖字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　軖； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1240第08
【廣韻】巨王切【集韻】曲王切，?音劻。【說文】方車也。一曰一輪車。【正字通】卽今役夫運載者。　又【集韻】渠王切，音狂。車戾也。　【說文】本作?。俗省作軖。又譌作?。

軖字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
軖字的起名意思

暂无。

wheelbarrow.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [kuáng]
["Guangyun" Giant Wangqie, Pingyang, Qun. ]
Also known as "軭1".
Reeling wheel. Also refers to the hand-cranked silk reeling car.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　軖; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1240 Page 08
[Guang Yun] Giant Wang Qi [Ji Yun] Qu Wang Qi,? Yinkuo. [Said the text] Fang Che also. One is a one-wheeler. 【Zhengzitong】The carrier of the present yakufu.　[Jiyun] Qu Wang cut, sound crazy. Che Hu also.　【Said the text】This work?. The customary province is used as a worm. Again?
